How Tiny Password Works

When you see your password hidden like ******** on a website, the text version of the password is still available (just hidden to humans).

Tiny Password is a smol chrome extension that shows you your paS$w0rd! as text when you click on the ******* version.

No data is stored
No login is required

Nothing else to really say, I'm simply the smollest password helper.
